```{r}
X <- rnorm(30000, mean = 27, sd = 1.8)
```

```{r}
X <- c(X, rep(36, 10))
```

```{r}
hist(X)
```

```{r}
library(fitdistrplus)
```

```{r}
descdist(X, boot = 50)
```
```{r}
FDN <- fitdist(X, "norm")
FDG <- fitdist(X, "gamma")
```

```{r}
plot(FDN)
```
```{r}
plot(FDG)
```

```{r}
GOFL <- gofstat(list(FDN, FDG), fitnames = list("Nomal", "Gamma"))
```

```{r}
(GOFL)
```

```{r}
x <- DF$LLAMADAS_OUT_TOT[!is.na(DF$LLAMADAS_OUT_TOT)]

x1[x1 == -Inf] <- NA

descdist(x1,discrete = T )
hist(x1)
```
